A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was incredibly let down because I know Rian Johnson is capable of so much more as he proved in Looper. The biggest mistakes were the lackluster reveal of Rey’s parents and the fate of Snoke. Had Snoke been the one to influence the Force to create life in Shmi Skywalker and to do the same thing again for Rey would have seamlessly tied all 3 trilogies together. Now\, I just don’t care what happens in the 9th film...
